alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 4:06PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds will impact portions of central Weber... eastern Box Elder...northern Salt Lake...northeastern Davis and west central Morgan Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 404 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds near Layton, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ogden, Layton, Bountiful, Farmington, Hill Air Force Base, Roy, Clearfield, Kaysville, Syracuse, Clinton, North Ogden, South Ogden, Centerville, Washington Terrace, Riverdale, Hooper, South Weber, West Bountiful, Marriott-Slaterville and Uintah. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 318 and 352. Interstate 84 between mile markers 82 and 89. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
